expected_goal: Analyze sentiment of all .txt files in documents folder, create a comparison report of most positive vs negative documents, and email it to manager@company.com.

atomic: List all .txt files in the documents folder.
Read the content of each .txt file.
Analyze the sentiment of each document.
Rank documents from most positive to most negative based on sentiment scores.
Create a comparison report highlighting the most positive and most negative documents.
Email the sentiment comparison report to manager@company.com.
macro: List all .txt files in the documents folder.
Read the content of each .txt file.
Analyze the sentiment of each document.
Rank documents from most positive to most negative based on sentiment scores.
Create a comparison report highlighting the most positive and most negative documents.
Email the sentiment comparison report to manager@company.com.
